title: PUCSL to hike electricity tariffs once Govt. grants policy guidelines
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) will take a decision to increase electricity tariffs as soon as the government grants policy guidelines, PUCSL Chairman Janaka Ratnayake said today.
He said there will not be any increase in electricity tariffs tonight as reported. (Chaturanga Samarawickrame)
